name: On The Path
description:
On The Path - is an RPG with elements of camp development
and a philosophical implication,
your main enemy is Time Limit.

  • 180 + minutes of gameplay,
  • 20 minutes of cutscenes,
  • Base development,
  • 4 kinds of weapons to upgrade,
  • Magic development,
  • hard-time limit, its all centered on right, quick decisions and the Idea is to keep players in intension,
  • and food for thought.






On The Path - is a game based on ancient russian fairy tales and taoism of Lao Tzu , it takes place in a world where women and men with magic talents, which represent Yin and Yang, fight against each other. Some madness mix. And, yes, you play as Koschei the Deathless.


In the game narrative the plot component is expressed in the form of a fairly extensive begininng cut-scene and two variants of logical endings, one of which is ideologically true (the second ending) .

This game isn’t based on RPG Maker`s battlesystem ( but the game includes it ) . Your main goal is to perform quick actions because you have TWO timers at the same time. You must develop your camp, using two types of resources - steel and wood. Seeds are resources that you must supply to gain additional time for second timer. You get them be defeating enemies. You can use one weapon but can change it in the Arsenal . There are 4 weapons. Also, it upgrades a bit in the Smithy. According to the law of genre Magic Tower is also included.


  • Strengthening Hall – you can increase your maximum number of HP. HP are collected for a certain time until you pick them up. But you can`t stay still because your time is running out every second!

  • Smithy – you can upgrade your weapons, paying resourses and killed enemies off it.

  • Magic tower - you can own magical powers at the same price – the resourses that support your life energy in the Wood and accumulate the strengthening of life in the Hall.

  • Fountain – you can completely fill up your HP with the help of it if you replenish the Fountain from a nearby Source. But you have to decide whether you go to the Fountain or to the Resourse Mine. Or maybe you will go to the one of the above-mentioned buildings. Or you will kill the next enemy to prolong the time of stay in the Wood...
The stress of the escaping time and responsibility for tactical decision-making is waiting for you in the Wood that holds a secret of the Stones, the Undead creatures and the Meaning of Life. But this secret is not for everyone.
